desc: Healing Brave is an online space for people who want to turn their pain into medicine. You'll find grief poetry, healing affirmations, self-care rituals and books, hand lettered art prints, encouragement cards, guided meditations, and other words of hope to keep you (and the people you love) going.

layout.text: All that, and you're still standing.
SOMEONE should be telling you how absolutely stunning that is. Get my Healing Brave Manifesto (it's free) and I'll tell you.
